post.author: 강윤정
post.content:
I got a phone call from a job agent who is looking for a candidate of this position.
senior web developer location: downtown required skills: java, jsp, perl, html and other web-based knowledges. minimum 3 years of web-project experience
If anyone interested, make a phone call to 416-777-1717(ext:236) Mike Tam
post.title: [Wanted]senior web-developer with Java,JSP,Perl and HTML
